name: web-page-access
description: An example of a program that make a request to a remote service, waits for the response, and performs an action with the response. The response is obtain from a known entity(website), but at an arbitrary time in the future, after request has been made.
author: Elom Atsou Agboka <opentech.consult@gmail.com> (https://github.com/OpenTechConsult)
